description: Make this chicken traybake for a simple weeknight dinner. Load an oven tray with broccolini, capsicum and chicken, toss in an herby sauce, and bake. Easy.
keywords: Dinner,Pescatarian,Broccolini,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Spanish Style Chicken & Broccolini Tray Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6-8 chicken thigh cutlets, skin on bone in

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C fan forced. Arrange Broccolini®, Minicaps® and onion in a large greased roasting pan.
Combine 2 tablespoons oil, 1 teaspoon paprika and 1 teaspoon cumin and spoon over the vegetables. Turn to coat.
Score each piece of chicken twice
Combine the remaining oil, paprika and cumin with garlic and tomato puree in a large bowl.
Add the chicken and mix until well coated. Place skin side up over the vegetables and scatter over the thyme
Roast for 30-40 minutes or until chicken is cooked through (insert a skewer into the centre, if the juices run clear the chicken is cooked). Serve with couscous and lemon wedges
Serve with couscous and lemon wedges
